title: BetterDesktopTool Standard Edition v1.90
description:
BetterDesktopTool Standard Edition v1.90
ExposÃ© and Spaces like Features for Windows

Features - Standard Edition

...Window-Overview
http://www.betterdesktoptool.com/images/demo/1.gif
Arranges all windows in a non overlapping layout. Allows selection of an arbitrary window to bring it to the foreground.
Can be applied to minimized, non-minimized and foreground application windows.
Supports Multi-Monitor setups.

...Desktop-Overview
http://www.betterdesktoptool.com/images/demo/3.gif
Moves all windows away from your desktop to give you access to Desktop-Shortcuts and Sidebar-Gadgets.
Supports Multi-Monitor setups.

...Configuration of Mouse and Keyboard shortcuts for all functions.
http://www.betterdesktoptool.com/images/demo/shortcut.jpg

...Configuration of Hot-Corners for all functions.
http://www.betterdesktoptool.com/images/demo/activeedge.jpg

...Multitouch-Gesture support for Microsoft Touch Mouse, Logitech T620 Touch Mouse and Logitech T650 Touchpad

...Requirements
Microsoft Windows Vista SP2 (32/64 Bit), Windows 7 SP1 (32/64 Bit), Windows 8 (32/64 Bit), Windows 10 (32/64 Bit).
Windows Aero Glass and sufficient Graphics Card.
Microsoft .NET Framework 4.0 (Usually installed by automatic Updates on all Systems).

NOTE 1: Aero is required to be active in order for the software to work.
NOTE 2: This is the Standard version of the software, free for personal use. 
http://www.betterdesktoptool.com/index.html
